resources.string: "Payment can be made through M-PESA phone no- 0724227124 or Paybill - 110560"
Location: Madaraka Estate, Ole Sangale Road. Postal Address: P.O. Box 59857, 00200, City Square, Nairobi, Kenya.

Strath Car Rentals is a car rental service provider that focuses on providing a comfortable and safe driving experience for customers. With a wide variety of cars available, Strath Car Rentals provides options to suit customer needs and preferences. 

 Our vision is to be a trusted partner in the customer journey by providing the best service and a satisfying experience. We are committed to maintaining the reliability, cleanliness and quality of our vehicles so that customers feel satisfied and have confidence in our services. 

 Security is our top priority. Every car in the Strath Car Rentals app undergoes periodic inspections and regular maintenance to ensure optimal condition and customer safety. 

 We invite you to explore our app, view the wide selection of cars available, read customer reviews and book a car easily. With Strath Car Rentals, enjoy your trip comfortably, worry-free and full of excitement
